attributes.action: Do what is right to protect the future of the UK and revoke Article 50.
attributes.additional_details:
This is supported by the Governments own analysts!
https://www.instituteforgovernment.org.uk/blog/government-brexit-economic-analysis-deserves-taken-seriously
attributes.background: Any Brexit, especially a no deal, is detrimental to the future of our country both financially and to the integrity of the Union. The damage It will do, will be to the Counties and the people least likely to cope with the loss of jobs and the financial support now provided by our EU membership!
